titles: An elegy on the renowned memory of the right reverend Edward, late Bishop of Norwich.
notes: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Verse: "WHat means our Poets silence! all struck dumb! ..."
At foot: Licensed and entred according to order.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
